name: Dr. Jane Smith
bio: Dr. Smith is a leading expert in soft tissue mobilization and has been a certified Graston Technique instructor for over 10 years.

name: Dr. Michael Clark
bio: With a background in sports medicine, Dr. Clark specializes in athletic injuries and performance enhancement using GT.

name: Dr. Emily White
bio: Dr. White's research focuses on the neurological effects of instrument-assisted soft tissue mobilization.

name: Dr. Robert Green
bio: A physical therapist for over 20 years, Dr. Green brings a wealth of clinical experience to his teaching.

name: Dr. Sarah Brown
bio: Dr. Brown is a certified athletic trainer and instructor, focusing on rehabilitation protocols.

name: Dr. David Wilson
bio: An expert in post-surgical recovery, Dr. Wilson integrates Graston Technique into his comprehensive patient care plans.

name: Dr. Linda Taylor
bio: Dr. Taylor is a chiropractor and a master instructor, known for her dynamic and engaging teaching style.
